医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
政府发起咨询，为儿童提供新的保护，使其免受未来罢工行动的影响今天，政府发起了一项磋商，以在未来的罢工行动中为儿童和青少年的教育引入新的保护措施。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231129/Government-launches-consultation-to-introduce-new-protections-for-children-from-future-strike-action.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231129/Government-launches-consultation-to-introduce-new-protections-for-children-from-future-strike-action.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=935ad601-6302-4960-934a-13c5d1b75080 Wed, 29 Nov 2023 00:44:44 -0500 Government launches consultation to introduce new protections for children from future strike action
韦恩州立大学教授荣获 265 万美元 NIH 奖，用于开发用于胰岛素管理的新型过滤平台韦恩州立大学工程学院的一位教授获得了美国国立卫生研究院国家糖尿病、消化和肾脏疾病研究所颁发的 265 万美元奖金，用于开发一种新型过滤平台，以改进先进的药物输送装置，从而优化糖尿病胰岛素治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231128/Wayne-State-professor-wins-24265-million-NIH-award-to-develop-novel-filtration-platform-for-insulin-administration.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231128/Wayne-State-professor-wins-24265-million-NIH-award-to-develop-novel-filtration-platform-for-insulin-administration.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=178e3a86-777c-44cf-806c-f35b539bf5be Tue, 28 Nov 2023 23:04:00 -0500 Wayne State professor wins $2.65 million NIH award to develop novel filtration platform for insulin administration
每天坐6小时的女性患子宫肌瘤的可能性增加一倍发表在开放获取期刊 BMJ Open 上的研究表明，每天静坐 6 小时或以上的休闲时间可能会使女性在更年期之前患子宫肌瘤的风险增加一倍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231128/Women-who-sit-for-6-hours-a-day-twice-as-likely-to-develop-uterine-firoids.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231128/Women-who-sit-for-6-hours-a-day-twice-as-likely-to-develop-uterine-tropical.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=01c35c18-4ae0-4307-a3cf-f634d021e846 Tue, 28 Nov 2023 22:52:57 -0500 Women who sit for 6 hours a day twice as likely to develop uterine fibroids
快走可显着降低 2 型糖尿病风险《英国运动医学杂志》在线发表的一项对现有证据的汇总数据分析表明，以每小时 4 公里或以上的速度行走可显着降低患 2 型糖尿病的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231128/Brisk-walking- Associate-with-significantly-lower-risk-of-type-2-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231128/Brisk-walking-linked-with-significantly-lower-risk-of-type-2-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8f935922-3e97-4e10-905e-6540a4323cfb Tue, 28 Nov 2023 22:48:44 -0500 Brisk walking associated with significantly lower risk of type 2 diabetes
怀孕期间的 COVID-19 会增加早产风险，疫苗提供重要保护研究表明，感染 COVID-19 的孕妇早产的风险较高，这对健康和社会经济产生重大影响。然而，早期疫苗接种者表现出免受这些影响的保护，突显了疫苗在保障子孙后代健康方面的关键作用，特别是在进行这项研究的美国。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231128/COVID-19-in-pregnancy-raises-preterm-birth-risk-vaccines-offer-crucial-shield.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231128/COVID-19-in-pregnancy-raises-preterm-birth-risk-vaccines-offer-crucial-shield.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ab68c52e-2906-441e-ab18-a322437bf5c9 Tue, 28 Nov 2023 22:22:00 -0500 COVID-19 in pregnancy raises preterm birth risk, vaccines offer crucial shield
研究发现治疗局部晚期胰腺癌的有前景的新方法德克萨斯大学 MD 安德森癌症中心和莫菲特癌症中心的研究人员进行的一项新的 Ib/II 期研究发现，将增敏药物与特定形式的放射治疗相结合可能对局部晚期胰腺癌患者更有效，从而使进展更快-无生存期（PFS）和总体缓解率（ORR）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231128/Study-finds-promising-new-approach-to-treating-locally-advanced-pancreatic-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231128/Study-finds-promising-new-approach-to-treating-locally-advanced-pancreatic-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c735d9b4-2652-4d4d-8548-d4aa2a766474 Tue, 28 Nov 2023 22:13:17 -0500 Study finds promising new approach to treating locally advanced pancreatic cancer
解码焦虑：研究揭示大脑在行为抑制风险中的作用美国研究人员使用非人类灵长类动物模型来探索行为抑制背后的分子机制和神经系统，而行为抑制是焦虑症的关键危险因素。该研究确定了后眶额皮质中与焦虑气质变化相关的分子系统，为治疗焦虑症提供了潜在的目标。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231128/Decoding-anxiety-Study-reveals-brains-role-in-behavioral-inhibition-risks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231128/Decoding-anxiety-Study-reveals-brains-role-in-behavioral-inhibition-risks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b2cb2b4a-46ef-42ec-8d2e-7a5dba6ddc02 Tue, 28 Nov 2023 22:08:00 -0500 Decoding anxiety: Study reveals brain's role in behavioral inhibition risks
研究揭示了阿尔茨海默病中小胶质细胞驱动的神经炎症的机制布里格姆研究人员的一项研究揭示了某些类型脑细胞的基因变化如何导致阿尔茨海默病的炎症反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231128/Study-uncovers-mechanisms-underlying-microglia-driven-neuroinflammation-in-Alzheimers-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231128/Study-uncovers-mechanisms-underlying-microglia-driven-neuroinflammation-in-Alzheimers-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6cdfc05b-afac-46d0-ae1f-8a72e986c618 Tue, 28 Nov 2023 22:06:43 -0500 Study uncovers mechanisms underlying microglia-driven neuroinflammation in Alzheimer's disease
研究人员发现蝾螈的肌腱再生速度如何由名古屋大学工程研究生院领导的一个研究小组发现了蝾螈肌腱再生的速度有多快。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231128/Researchers-discover-how-rapid-tendon-regenesis-occurrs-in-newts.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231128/Researchers-discover-how-rapid-tendon-regenesis-occurrs-in-newts.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f1b30b3a-a13a-4478-bbc6-989c14f60772 Tue, 28 Nov 2023 21:55:32 -0500 Researchers discover how rapid tendon regeneration occurs in newts
为健康干杯：探索葡萄酒的健康秘密《食品》杂志上的一篇评论研究了葡萄酒和相关产品中促进健康的化合物，重点关注其检测和研究的技术进步。它旨在为酿酒和葡萄栽培提供信息，在保持口味的同时增强人类健康益处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231128/Cheers-to-health-Exploring-wines-wellness-secrets.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231128/Cheers-to-health-Exploring-wines-wellness-secrets.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f746127f-24bc-47dd-9d76-9a6dd4ff38e0 Tue, 28 Nov 2023 21:48:00 -0500 Cheers to health: Exploring wine's wellness secrets
